message: Let's split it evenly, no need to overthink it!
I'll take the majority, but I'll still give you a fair share
I'll take a smaller share, but I'm still hoping for a better deal
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm still not willing to give up too much
I'll take an even smaller share, but I'm still holding out for a better deal
I'll meet you halfway, but I'm not going to give up more
